content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### First Furnace at position (0.0, 0.0)
Consists of:
- Furnace (position 0.0, 0.0) with status EntityStatus.WORKING, currently processing iron ore into iron plates. The furnace has a fuel inventory containing coal.

### Second Furnace at position (2.0, 0.0)
Consists of:
- Furnace (position 2.0, 0.0) with status EntityStatus.WORKING, currently processing iron ore into iron plates. The furnace has a fuel inventory containing coal.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting into furnaces with insufficient ingredients
- Ensure that you have enough iron ore in your inventory before attempting to insert it into the furnaces. Check your inventory status before insertion.

### Errors when the furnace result is full
- Monitor the output inventory of the furnaces to avoid inserting more ingredients when the result inventory is full. Remove excess items from the output before inserting more raw materials.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items to avoid extraction failures. 

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it. Check for existing entities in the target position.
